text: The Last Hill () is a 1944 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Военные киноленты "Ленфильма" покажут в Артиллерийском музее ПетербургаМалахов курган (1944) It stars Nikolay Kryuchkov, Boris Andreyev, and Akaki Khorava. == Actors == * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Cmdr. Boris Likhachyov * Boris Andreyev as Maj. Zhukovskiy * Akaki Khorava as Vice-Admiral (as A. Khorava) * Maria Pastukhova as Mariya Perventsova (as M. Pastukhova) * Fyodor Ishchenko as Sailor (as F. Ishchenko) * Nikolay Gorlov as Sailor (as N. Gorlov) * Yevgeni Perov as Sailor (as E. Perov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1944 drama movies Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Last Hill
